ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Lake rathe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, just a bit of warning. Guards hit hard, and using weapons (PGT/Dragoon Dirk)  it was 50/50 win/flee. I didn t trust all instrument at the time, in
ygData.messageBody:
>Was wondering if any one here has taken there bard to kill avick guards. If
>any one has. Could you please tell me what level they could solo one and
>what tactics they used. This is my first times playing a bard! Over my
>shaman the songs are kinda a strange to me!


Well, just a bit of warning. Guards hit hard, and using weapons (PGT/Dragoon
Dirk) it was 50/50 win/flee. I didn't trust all instrument at the time, in
retrospect I can see I was wrong :o) Anyway, in my experience don't assume
you will have the same success with weapon attack.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 26, Povar
